item.name: Tamanho total ARCHIVELOG no ASM
item.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a, V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where a.group_number = b.group_number AND a.type = 'ARCHIVELOG'

item.name: Tamanho total DATAFILES no ASM
item.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a, V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where a.group_number = b.group_number AND a.type = 'DATAFILE'

item.name: Tamanho total ONLINELOG no ASM
item.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a, V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where a.group_number = b.group_number AND a.type = 'ONLINELOG'

item.name: Tamanho total TEMPFILES no ASM
item.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a, V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where a.group_number = b.group_number AND a.type = 'TEMPFILE'

item.name: Waits Buffer busy
item.params: select to_char(time_waited, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$system_event se, v$event_name en where se.event(+) = en.name and en.name = 'buffer busy waits';

item.name: Oracle User Commits
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'user commits';

item.name: Tamanho de todos os datafiles
item.params: select to_char(sum(bytes), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from dba_data_files;

item.name: Waits DB file parallel write
Waits DB file scattered read
Waits DB file sequential read
Tamanho usado do Banco
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum( NVL(a.bytes - NVL(f.bytes, 0), 0)), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue FROM sys.dba_tablespaces d, (select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) bytes from dba_data_files group by tablespace_name) a, (select tablespace_name, sum(bytes) bytes from dba_free_space group by tablespace_name) f WHERE d.tablespace_name = a.tablespace_name(+) AND d.tablespace_name = f.tablespace_name(+) AND NOT (d.extent_management like 'LOCAL' AND d.contents like 'TEMPORARY');

item.name: Waits DB file single write
Deadlocks (delta, simple change)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'enqueue deadlocks';

item.name: SysStat - Disk sorts ratio
item.params: SELECT to_char(d.value/(d.value + m.value)*100, 'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat m, v$sysstat d WHERE m.name = 'sorts (memory)' AND d.name = 'sorts (disk)';

item.name: Historico de Bloqueio
item.params: SELECT 'Usuario SO: '||UPPER(VS.OSUSER)||', Usuario banco: '||UPPER(VS.USERNAME)||', SID: '||VH.SID ||', Programa: '||VS.PROGRAM|| ' Bloqueando: '||'Usuario SO: '||VSW.OSUSER||', Usuario banco: '||UPPER(VSW.USERNAME)||', SID: '||VSW.SID||', Programa: '||VSW.PROGRAM RESULTADO FROM GV$LOCK VH, GV$LOCK VW, GV$SESSION VS, GV$SESSION VSW, DBA_SCHEDULER_RUNNING_JOBS JRH, DBA_SCHEDULER_RUNNING_JOBS JRW WHERE (VH.ID1, VH.ID2) IN (SELECT ID1, ID2 FROM GV$LOCK WHERE REQUEST = 0 INTERSECT SELECT ID1, ID2 FROM GV$LOCK WHERE LMODE = 0) AND VH.ID1 = VW.ID1 AND VH.ID2 = VW.ID2 AND VH.REQUEST = 0 AND VW.LMODE = 0 AND VH.SID = VS.SID AND VW.SID = VSW.SID AND VH.SID = JRH.SESSION_ID(+)AND VW.SID = JRW.SESSION_ID(+)

item.name: SysStat - Hard parse ratio
item.params: SELECT to_char(h.value/t.value*100,'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat h, v$sysstat t WHERE h.name = 'parse count (hard)' AND t.name = 'parse count (total)';

item.name: SysStat - Index fast full scans (full) (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'index fast full scans (full)';

item.name: Archivelog - Last applied archive log (at standby)
Archivelog - Last archived log sequence
item.params: select to_char(max(SEQUENCE#), 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$log where archived = 'YES';

item.name: Events - Latch free
Oracle Live DB
item.params: select to_char(1, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from dual;

item.name: Events Log file sync
Events Log file parallel write
Events Log file switch completion
Archivelog
item.params: select to_char(round(A.LOGS*B.AVG/1024/1024/10),'FM99999999999999990') from ( SELECT COUNT (*) LOGS FROM V$LOG_HISTORY WHERE FIRST_TIME >= (sysdate -10/60/24)) A, ( SELECT Avg(BYTES) AVG, Count(1), Max(BYTES) Max_Bytes, Min(BYTES) Min_Bytes FROM v$log) B

item.name: Geracao_Archivelog_por_dia
item.params: select to_char(round(SUM(blocks*block_size/1024/1024)/30,2),'FM99999999999999990') MB_POR_DIA from v$archived_log where completion_time >= sysdate-30

item.name: Geracao_Archivelog_por_hora
item.params: select to_char(round(SUM(blocks*block_size/1024/1024)/24,2),'FM99999999999999990') MB_POR_HORA from v$archived_log where completion_time >= sysdate-1

item.name: Audit
item.params: select username "username", to_char(timestamp,'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') "time_stamp", action_name "statement", os_username "os_username", userhost "userhost", returncode||decode(returncode,'1004','-Wrong Connection','1005','-NULL Password','1017','-Wrong Password','1045','-Insufficient Priviledge','0','-Login Accepted','--') "returncode" from sys.dba_audit_session where (sysdate - timestamp)*24 < 1 and returncode <> 0 order by timestamp

item.name: Backup ARCHIVELOG - STATUS
item.params: SELECT CASE STATUS WHEN 'COMPLETED' THEN '5' WHEN 'RUNNING' THEN '4' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH WARNINGS' THEN '3' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH ERRORS' THEN '2' WHEN 'FAILED' THEN '1' ELSE 'FM99999999999999990' END AS STATUS FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'ARCHIVELOG' AND START_TIME = (SELECT MAX(START_TIME) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'ARCHIVELOG') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

item.name: Backup CONTROLFILES - STATUS
item.params: SELECT CASE STATUS WHEN 'COMPLETED' THEN '5' WHEN 'RUNNING' THEN '4' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH WARNINGS' THEN '3' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH ERRORS' THEN '2' WHEN 'FAILED' THEN '1' ELSE 'FM99999999999999990' END AS STATUS FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'CONTROLFILE' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'CONTROLFILE') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

item.name: Backup DATAFILES - STATUS
item.params: SELECT CASE STATUS WHEN 'COMPLETED' THEN '5' WHEN 'RUNNING' THEN '4' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH WARNINGS' THEN '3' WHEN 'COMPLETED WITH ERRORS' THEN '2' WHEN 'FAILED' THEN '1' ELSE 'FM99999999999999990' END AS STATUS FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'DB INCR' AND START_TIME = (SELECT MAX(START_TIME) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = 'DB INCR') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC

item.name: Bloqueios
item.params: SELECT to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') FROM sys.gv_$lock gvh, sys.gv_$lock gvw, sys.gv_$session gvs, sys.gv_$process gvp, sys.gv_$session gvsw WHERE (gvh.id1, gvh.id2) in ( SELECT id1, id2 FROM sys.gv_$lock WHERE request=0 INTERSECT SELECT id1, id2 FROM sys.gv_$lock WHERE lmode=0) AND gvh.id1=gvw.id1 AND gvh.id2=gvw.id2 AND gvh.request=0 AND gvw.lmode=0 AND gvh.sid=gvs.sid AND gvh.inst_id=gvs.inst_id AND gvs.paddr = gvp.addr(+) AND gvs.inst_id = gvp.inst_id AND gvw.inst_id = gvsw.inst_id AND gvw.sid = gvsw.sid

item.name: DB Block Gets
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'db block gets', value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') "block_gets" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Consistent Gets
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'consistent gets', value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') "consistent_gets" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Hit Ratio
item.params: select to_char(round(( sum(decode(name,'consistent gets', value,0)) + sum(decode(name,'db block gets', value,0)) - sum(decode(name,'physical reads', value,0))) / (sum(decode(name,'consistent gets', value,0)) + sum(decode(name,'db block gets', value,0)) ) * 100,2),'FM99999999999999990') "hit_ratio" FROM v$sysstat

item.name: DB Installed Options
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(opt,chr(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY num) AS teste FROM (select rownum as num, COMP_ID||' '||COMP_NAME||' '||VERSION||' '||STATUS as opt from dba_registry);

item.name: DB Version
item.params: SELECT LISTAGG(opt,chr(13)) WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY num) AS teste FROM (SELECT rownum as num, banner as opt FROM V$VERSION);

item.name: Hit ratio - BODY
item.params: select to_char(gethitratio*100,'FM99999999999999990') "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='BODY'

item.name: Hit ratio - SQLAREA
item.params: select to_char(gethitratio*100,'FM99999999999999990') "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='SQL AREA'

item.name: Hit ratio - TABLE/PROCEDURE
item.params: select to_char(gethitratio*100,'FM99999999999999990') "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache where namespace = 'TABLE/PROCEDURE'

item.name: Hit ratio - TRIGGER
item.params: select to_char(gethitratio*100,'FM99999999999999990') "get_pct" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='TRIGGER'

item.name: LI/O Block Change
item.params: SELECT to_char(SUM(DECODE(NAME,'db block changes',VALUE,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='db block changes'

item.name: LI/O Consinstent Read
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(name,'consistent gets',value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='consistent gets'

item.name: LI/O Current Read
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(name,'db block gets',value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT WHERE NAME ='db block gets'

item.name: Locks
item.params: select sn.USERNAME ||'@'||sn.machine, '|SID->' || m.SID, '|Serial->'|| sn.SERIAL#, '|Lock Type->'||m.TYPE, decode(LMODE, 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive') lock_type, decode(REQUEST, 0, 'None', 1, 'Null', 2, 'Row-S (SS)', 3, 'Row-X (SX)', 4, 'Share', 5, 'S/Row-X (SSX)', 6, 'Exclusive') lock_requested, '|Time (Sec)->'||m.CTIME "Time(sec)", '|ID1->'||m.ID1, '|ID2->'||m.ID2, '|SQL Text->'||t.SQL_TEXT from v$session sn, v$lock m , v$sqltext t where t.ADDRESS =sn.SQL_ADDRESS and t.HASH_VALUE =sn.SQL_HASH_VALUE and ((sn.SID =m.SID and m.REQUEST !=0) or (sn.SID =m.SID and m.REQUEST =0 and LMODE !=4 and (ID1, ID2) in (select s.ID1, s.ID2 from v$lock S where REQUEST !=0 and s.ctime > 5 and s.ID1 =m.ID1 and s.ID2 =m.ID2))) order by sn.USERNAME, sn.SID, t.PIECE

item.name: Max Processes
item.params: select to_char(value,'FM99999999999999990') "maxprocs" from v$parameter where name ='processes'

item.name: Max Sessions
item.params: select to_char(value,'FM99999999999999990') "maxsess" from v$parameter where name ='sessions'

item.name: PGA
item.params: select to_char(decode( unit,'bytes', value/1024/1024, value),'FM99999999999999990') value from V$PGASTAT where name in 'total PGA inuse'

item.name: PGA Aggregate target
item.params: select to_char(decode( unit,'bytes', value/1024/1024, value),'FM99999999999999990') value from V$PGASTAT where name in 'aggregate PGA target parameter'

item.name: PHI/O Datafile Reads
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'physical reads direct',value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='physical reads direct'

item.name: PHI/O Datafile Writes
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'physical writes direct',value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='physical writes direct'

item.name: PHI/O Redo Writes
item.params: select to_char(sum(decode(name,'redo writes',value,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SYSSTAT where name ='redo writes'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - BODY
item.params: select to_char(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,'FM99999999999999990') "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='BODY'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - SQLAREA
item.params: select to_char(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,'FM99999999999999990') "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='SQL AREA'

item.name: Pin hit ratio - TABLE-PROCEDURE
item.params: select to_char((sysdate-startup_time)*86400, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$instance

item.name: Pin hit ratio - TRIGGER
item.params: select to_char(pins/(pins+reloads)*100,'FM99999999999999990') "pin_hit ratio" FROM v$librarycache where namespace ='TRIGGER'

item.name: Pool dict cache
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'dictionary cache',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_dict_cache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool free mem
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'free memory',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_free_mem FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool lib cache
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'library cache',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_lib_cache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool misc
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'library cache',0,'dictionary cache',0,'free memory',0,'sql area', 0,(bytes)/(1024*1024)),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_misc FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Pool sql area
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'sql area',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_sql_area FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Processes
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') "procnum" from v$process

item.name: Qtd Locks
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session sn, v$lock m , v$sqltext t where t.ADDRESS =sn.SQL_ADDRESS and t.HASH_VALUE =sn.SQL_HASH_VALUE and ((sn.SID =m.SID and m.REQUEST !=0) or (sn.SID =m.SID and m.REQUEST =0 and LMODE !=4 and (ID1, ID2) in (select s.ID1, s.ID2 from v$lock S where REQUEST !=0 and s.ctime > 5 and s.ID1 =m.ID1 and s.ID2 =m.ID2))) order by sn.USERNAME, sn.SID, t.PIECE

item.name: Sessions
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session

item.name: Session Active
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session where TYPE!='BACKGROUND' and status='ACTIVE'

item.name: Session Inactive
item.params: select to_char(SUM(Decode(Type, 'BACKGROUND', 0, Decode(Status, 'ACTIVE', 0, 1))),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$SESSION

item.name: Session System
item.params: select to_char(SUM(Decode(Type, 'BACKGROUND', 1, 0)),'FM99999999999999990') system_sessions FROM V$SESSION

item.name: Session Usuarios
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session WHERE type='USER'

item.name: Session Usuarios Ativos
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session WHERE type='USER' and status='ACTIVE'

item.name: Session Usuarios Inativos
item.params: select to_char(count(*),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session WHERE type='USER' and status<>'ACTIVE'

item.name: SGA buffer cache
item.params: SELECT to_char(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,NULL,decode(name,'db_block_buffers',(bytes)/(1024*1024),'buffer_cache',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') sga_bufcache FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA fixed
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,NULL,decode(name,'fixed_sga',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') sga_fixed FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA java pool
item.params: SELECT to_char(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'java pool',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') sga_jpool FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA large pool
item.params: SELECT to_char(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'large pool',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') sga_lpool FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA log buffer
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,NULL,decode(name,'log_buffer',(bytes)/(1024*1024),0),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') sga_lbuffer FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: SGA shared pool
item.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(ROUND(SUM(decode(pool,'shared pool',decode(name,'library cache',0,'dictionary cache',0,'free memory',0,'sql area',0,(bytes)/(1024*1024)),0)),2),'FM99999999999999990') pool_misc FROM V$SGASTAT

item.name: Uptime
item.params: select to_char((sysdate-startup_time)*86400, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$instance

item.name: Users Connected
item.params: select to_char(count(username),'FM99999999999999990') from v$session where username is not null

item.name: Users Locked
item.params: SELECT username || ' ' || lock_date || ' ' || account_status as res FROM dba_users where ACCOUNT_STATUS like 'EXPIRED(GRACE)' or ACCOUNT_STATUS like 'LOCKED(TIMED)' union select 'none' from dual where not exists ( SELECT username FROM dba_users where ACCOUNT_STATUS like 'EXPIRED(GRACE)' or ACCOUNT_STATUS like 'LOCKED(TIMED)' )

item.name: Waits Controlfile I/O
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'control file sequential read', total_waits, 'control file single write', total_waits, 'control file parallel write',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') ControlFileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client','pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits direct path read
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'direct path read',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') DirectPathRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from ', 'SQL*Net more data from client','pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits File I/O
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'file identify',total_waits, 'file open',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') FileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits latch
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'control file sequential read', total_waits, 'control file single write', total_waits, 'control file parallel write',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') ControlFileIO FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits Logwrite
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'log file single write',total_waits, 'log file parallel write',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') LogWrite FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits multiblock read
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'db file scattered read',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') MultiBlockRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Waits single block read
item.params: SELECT to_char(sum(decode(event,'db file sequential read',total_waits,0)),'FM99999999999999990') SingleBlockRead FROM V$system_event WHERE 1=1 AND event not in ( 'SQL*Net message from client', 'SQL*Net more data from client', 'pmon timer', 'rdbms ipc message', 'rdbms ipc reply', 'smon timer')

item.name: Hit ratio - Read Cache
item.params: SELECT to_char((1 - (phy.value - lob.value - dir.value) / ses.value) * 100, 'FM99999990.9999') retvalue FROM v$sysstat ses, v$sysstat lob, v$sysstat dir, v$sysstat phy WHERE ses.name = 'session logical reads' AND dir.name = 'physical reads direct' AND lob.name = 'physical reads direct (lob)' AND phy.name = 'physical reads';

item.name: Oracle User Rollbacks (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'user rollbacks';

item.name: SysStat - Table scan rows gotten (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'table scan rows gotten';

item.name: SysStat - Table scans (long tables) (delta)
item.params: select to_char(value, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$sysstat where name = 'table scans (long tables)';

item.name: Oracle Usercount
item.params: select to_char(count(*)-1, 'FM99999999999999990') retvalue from v$session where username is not null;

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Backups
discovery_rule.params: SELECT DISTINCT OBJECT_TYPE AS TIPO FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OBJECT_TYPE IS NOT NULL;

item_prototype.name: Data fim {#TIPO}
item_prototype.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(END_TIME, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') REAL_GB FROM V$RMAN_STATUS STAT WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC;

item_prototype.name: Data início {#TIPO}
item_prototype.params: SELECT TO_CHAR(START_TIME, 'DD-MON-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') REAL_GB FROM V$RMAN_STATUS STAT WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC;

item_prototype.name: Tamanho real lido {#TIPO}
item_prototype.params: SELECT to_char(INPUT_BYTES,'FM99999999999999990') REAL_GB FROM V$RMAN_STATUS STAT WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC;

item_prototype.name: Tamanho bkp {#TIPO}
item_prototype.params: SELECT to_char(OUTPUT_BYTES,'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$RMAN_STATUS STAT WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC;

item_prototype.name: TEMPO bkp {#TIPO}
item_prototype.params: SELECT to_char(TRUNC((END_TIME-START_TIME)*24*60*60,0),'FM99999999999999990') FROM V$RMAN_STATUS STAT WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED' and start_time = (select max(start_time) FROM V$RMAN_STATUS WHERE OPERATION = 'BACKUP' AND OBJECT_TYPE = '{#TIPO}' AND STATUS = 'COMPLETED') ORDER BY START_TIME DESC;

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Diskgroups ASM
discovery_rule.params: select name as DSKGROUPNAME from v$asm_diskgroup;

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado com ARCHIVELOGS do Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2),null,0,round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2)),'FM99999999999999990') util from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'ARCHIVELOG' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado com DATAFILES do Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2),null,0,round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2)),'FM99999999999999990') util from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'DATAFILE' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado com ONLINELOGS do Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2),null,0,round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2)),'FM99999999999999990') util from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'ONLINELOG' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado com OUTROS do Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2),null,0,round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2)),'FM99999999999999990') util from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type not in ('TEMPFILE','DATAFILE','ARCHIVELOG','ONLINELOG') and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado com TEMPFILES do Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2),null,0,round(sum(space)/1024/1024/avg((select total_MB from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = 'RECO'))*100,2)),'FM99999999999999990') util from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'TEMPFILE' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(round((total_MB-free_mb)/total_MB*100,2),'FM99999999999999990') from v$asm_diskgroup WHERE NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Tamanho dos ARCHIVELOGS em Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'ARCHIVELOG' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Tamanho dos DATAFILES em Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'DATAFILE' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Tamanho dos ONLINELOGS em Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'ONLINELOG' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Tamanho dos OUTROS em Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type not in ('TEMPFILE','DATAFILE','ARCHIVELOG','ONLINELOG') and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Tamanho dos TEMPFILES em Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round(sum(bytes),2),null,0,round(sum(bytes),2)),'FM99999999999999990') espaco_real from V$ASM_FILE a where a.type = 'TEMPFILE' and a.group_number = (select group_number from V$ASM_DISKGROUP b where b.NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}')

item_prototype.name: Tamanho Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(total_MB*1024*1024,'FM99999999999999990') from v$asm_diskgroup WHERE NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Espaço livre utilizável Diskgroup {#DSKGROUPNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(free_mb*1024*1024,'FM99999999999999990') from v$asm_diskgroup WHERE NAME = '{#DSKGROUPNAME}';

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Jobs
discovery_rule.params: SELECT job_name as JOBNAME, owner as JOBOWNER FROM dba_scheduler_jobs WHERE state != 'DISABLED' and job_name not like '%ORA$%';

item_prototype.name: Jobs em execuçao {#JOBOWNER}.{#JOBNAME}
item_prototype.params: SELECT to_char(nvl(max(work_minutes),0),'FM99999999999999990') FROM (SELECT owner, job_name, EXTRACT (HOUR FROM elapsed_time) * 60 + EXTRACT (MINUTE FROM elapsed_time) AS work_minutes FROM dba_scheduler_running_jobs WHERE owner = '{#JOBOWNER}' AND job_name = '{#JOBNAME}')
item_prototype.description: Время работы джоба, если не запущен то вернет 0

item_prototype.name: Status job {#JOBOWNER}.{#JOBNAME}
item_prototype.params: SELECT status FROM dba_scheduler_job_run_details WHERE log_date = (SELECT MAX (log_date) FROM dba_scheduler_job_run_details WHERE owner = '{#JOBOWNER}' AND job_name = '{#JOBNAME}')

discovery_rule.name: Oracle Tablespaces
discovery_rule.params: SELECT tablespace_name as TBSNAME FROM dba_tablespaces;

item_prototype.name: Espaço livre da tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(round(a.maxbytes - a.bytes_alloc + b.bytes_free,0),'FM99999999999999990') "free B" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Tamanho máximo tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(round(maxbytes,0),'FM99999999999999990') Max from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Tamanho tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(round(a.bytes_alloc, 0),'FM99999999999999990') "size B" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Percentual usado da tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(decode(round((a.bytes_alloc-b.bytes_free)/a.maxbytes*100,0), NULL, 100,round((a.bytes_alloc-b.bytes_free)/a.maxbytes*100,0)),'FM99999999999999990') "% used" from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

item_prototype.name: Espaço usado tablespace {#TBSNAME}
item_prototype.params: select to_char(round(a.bytes_alloc,0),'FM99999999999999990') from ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_alloc, sum(decode(f.autoextensible, 'YES',f.maxbytes,'NO', f.bytes)) maxbytes from dba_data_files f group by tablespace_name) a, ( select f.tablespace_name, sum(f.bytes) bytes_free from dba_free_space f group by tablespace_name) b where a.tablespace_name = b.tablespace_name and a.tablespace_name='{#TBSNAME}'

trigger_prototype.name: Espaço livre tablespace {#TBSNAME} menor que 5%
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace менее 3 Тб то триггер срабатывает при использованном пространстве более 97%

trigger_prototype.name: Свободное пространство в tablespace {#TBSNAME} менее 49 Гб
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 3 Тб, но менее 10 Тб - то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 49 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Свободное пространство в tablespace {#TBSNAME} менее 99 Гб
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 3 Тб, но менее 10 Тб - то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 99 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Свободное пространство в tablespace {#TBSNAME} менее 99 Гб
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 10 Тб то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 99 Гб

trigger_prototype.name: Свободное пространство в tablespace {#TBSNAME} менее 199 Гб
trigger_prototype.description: Если размер tablespace более 10 Тб то триггер срабатывает при оставшемся использованном пространстве менее 199 Гб

trigger.name: Read Cache Hit ratio on server {HOSTNAME}
